author: peter_firmstone
msg: Minor Refactoring to DependantTask and PriorityHandler to allow PriorityHandler to reveal the underlying Runnable as well as determine if the processing is complete and get the Result if desired.  This may be reversed and the PriorityHandler only recieve the underlying Runnable instead.  More thought required, perhaps too much coupling.

author: veithen
msg: Fixed the inclusion of legal files into the binary distribution.

author: veithen
msg: Make sure that the apache-release profile executes the source:jar goal only once. Also remove the maven-source-plugin from the root POM, where it is not necessary.

author: shaie
msg: LUCENE-2497: fix a bug that was introduced in LUCENE-2480
